name: Augury
description: By casting gem-inlaid sticks, bones, or similar tokens, you receive an omen about the results of a specific course of action you plan to take within the next 30 minutes. The omen is Weal, Woe, Weal and Woe, or Nothing.

components.materialDescription: specially marked sticks, bones, or similar tokens worth at least 25 gp

effects.description: Receive an omen (Weal, Woe, Weal and Woe, or Nothing) about a specific course of action to be taken within the next 30 minutes. Repeated casting before a long rest can give random results.
